Articles.Content:
I've been using Mechjeb 2 for orbital construction. Saves a lot of time. My latest project seems to have a problem. Any manouver I select, it sets the DeltaV required at 10,000 m/s, and the 'time to begin burn' at 20 seconds, and then the numbers do not change. At all. Even when I set a manoeuvre node manually, it has the same numbers, no matter how large/small a correction it is.

Is this something I've screwed up, something to do with the mod, or something unrelated?
